trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around October 21st 2012
Summary: Four bright redish orange lights floating across the night sky from the south towards the north in the same flight patterns
divs: Sighting DetailsFour ufo's bright red lights moved across the night sky slowly from the south east of Indianapolis Indiana heading north. They were low in the sky made no sound no blinking lights.The event took place around 9:13 and lasted for app. 10 min. There were four witnesses to this event.
